title: Door Fault at Dhoby Ghaut Station

title_translations.zh-Hans: 多美歌站出入口门故障
title_translations.ms: Kegagalan Pintu di Stesen Dhoby Ghaut

updates.text: [NSL] UPDATE: Fault at Dhoby Ghaut has been cleared. Expect additional 5 minutes travelling time from Newton to Marina Bay.
UPDATE: Estimated 20 mins additional traveling time between Marina Bay and Yishun on both bounds due to a door fault at Dhoby Ghaut station.
[NSL]: Estimate 20 mins additional traveling time between #MarinaBay and #Newton on both bound due to door fault at Dhoby Ghaut station.
[NSL]: Estimate 15 mins additional traveling time between #MarinaBay and #Newton on both bound due to door fault at Dhoby Ghaut station.
